1. Numeric-----int----> a=5
               float---> b=04;
               complex----> c=3+7j;

2. String------str-----a="hello",a='hi',a=''''hi'''';
                       b=""hello"' (not valid)

3. Tuples-----tuple------a=(2,0.6,"hello",3+4j)

4. Set----set----a={1,0.3,"hihjkhh",9+9j}

5. Dictionary------dict-----{key:value}

6.Boolean--------- True,False
